We refer to Wikipedia articles on entertainment for help. The events are chronological. First, a studio anchor reports on the news. Then, a man discusses Scientology. Next, a woman shares her experience with auditing on a red carpet. After that, auditions for Tom Cruise's project are described, followed by a discussion about Katie Holmes' dreams and the appearance of a magazine cover. Finally, golden text appears on screen, signifying that more content is coming up.

Therefore, the answer is (B).

The correct timeline is option D: 1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 3 -> 5 -> 6 -> 7.
At night, a news anchor appears as a narrator calls the split “Hollywood’s biggest cliffhanger.” (1)
An exterior “Church of Scientology” Los Angeles sign is shown while speakers link the split to his religion. (2)
A woman says the “most extraordinary thing” was meeting Tom and how happy she is, amid media flashes. (3)
A man in a light blue shirt at a laptop is introduced as journalist Mark Ebner. (4)
Over a document labeled “a blatant lie,” a voice states the church denies any wife-seeking project. (5)
Commentary notes Katie often appeared with a church spokesperson during their relationship. (6)
A web browser displays “freekatie.net” as a voice mentions “FreeKatie.com.” (7)

Therefore, the sequence is the news anchor introducing the situation, showing a sign related to Tom Cruise's religion, hearing a woman's perspective, seeing a reporter, reading about a church denying a project, learning about Katie's involvement with the church, and finally seeing a website related to the situation.
